description:
Atomium Toastmasters is a bilingual Dutch-English speech club where you can develop and practice your public speaking skills. Whether you're an executive, a stay-at-home parent, or a college student: everybody can benefit from practicing at Toastmasters! In a typical meeting, you can do both prepared speeches as well as impromptu presentations, and all this in a friendly and supportive environment with room for feedback.

We meet every 1st and 3rd Monday of the month from 18h45 until 21h00. You’re more than welcome to join us as a guest – free and without obligation to speech.

Our first meeting after the summer vacation is August 19th!

If you want to become a member: this costs €20 at the first time and from then on you pay €60 for a 6 months membership. In return, you can participate in all our meetings, you get a mentor, constructive feedback, a step-by-step manual and a monthly magazine. If your still hesitating, then please remind yourself that classical public speaking seminars easily cost up to €1000 for one day!

Visit our website at atomium.toastmastersclubs.org or contact us at [masked]
name: Join us and practice your public speaking skills!
Join us and practice your public speaking !
Join us and practice your public speaking!

description:
Dear All,

This Monday we'll have yet another Atomium Toastmaster meeting, and this time we'll host a special guest speaker: 

Lars Sudmann is a top leadership expert and will give an interactive workshop on motivating and inspiring people. Lars won several times the Belgian Toastmasters championship on public speaking and once even the European championship public speaking. 

So, please don't miss this great learning experience, don't hesitate to come as a guest if you're not a member, and off course you're also free to bring your own invitees !

Looking forward to meet you!

Lieven

Ps all information about our club, meeting dates, how to join us etc. can be found on atomium.toastmastersclubs.org .
name: Join us and practice your public speaking!
Join us and practice your public speaking !

description:
Dear,

You're most welcome to attend the annual Toastmasters Area B3 Speech & Evaluation Contest! 

We'll have 6 contestants for best evaluator, all six will evaluate a lead speech of a great speaker & story teller, and 6 contestants who'll compete to give the best speech.

The Attendance fee is 9€. If you wish to attend: please send an email to [masked] to confirm your presence.


When? Monday 31 March

Where? Quakerhouse, Square Ambiorix 50, Brussels

When? Monday 31 March

Where? Quakerhouse, Square Ambiorix 50, Brussel

Language? English

Program? 

18:15   Registration and welcome.

18:45   Welcome from Area Governor & Contest Chair

19:00   Evaluation contest

19:30   Coffee break

20:00   Speech contest

20:55   Awards ceremony

21:15   End

Looking forward! 

Lieven
name: Have a public speaking contest!

description:
NLP Practitioner & Master Practitioner in Brussels in July

The MomentumStrategies school will organize two NLP courses in English in Brussels in July. This can be of interest for many Toastmasters people, cf a message regarding NLP for Public speaking below. 


FOR MORE INFORMATION: http://www.meetup.com/nlp-training

<<How NLP can help you with public speaking

Does what you do require you to frequently deliver presentations to a large group of people, do you fret every time you need to say something about yourself or your product even to a small group, or do you feel your public speaking skills can be polished, so that everything you say is delivered in a sleek and confident way?

Anyone (!) can learn how to deliver powerful presentations and to be a convincing and authentic public speaker. And NLP can help!!!

NLP will help you learn

How to build Rapport with the audience
How to engage the audience
Calibration skills and Sensory acuity
State management and State choice for presenters
Presenting under challenging circumstances
How to overcome performance anxiety
How to overcome a fear of public speaking
How to use non-verbal communication tools for maximum impact
How to deal effectively with questions, comments and outbursts of hostility

In brief, NLP can give you the tools, the confidence and the ability to deliver engaging, powerful and impactful presentations, and establish yourself as a top of the class public speaker and presenter.>>

FOR MORE INFORMATION: http://www.meetup.com/nlp-training
name: Improve your public speaking skills with NLP during July in Brussels

description:
Dear All,

Join us for our twice-monthly meeting at Atomium Toastmasters, the only Dutch/English public speaking club in Brussels.

Atomium gathers people from different nationalities, different levels and different backgrounds in a friendly but effective learning environment.

You're welcome to join as a guest, and feel free to bring your own invitees!

More information about our club, meeting dates, how to join us etc. can be found on atomium.toastmastersclubs.org .
name: Public speaking training
